00199 template <class _Traits> mfMesh<_Traits>::mfMesh(ids block_size):

00226 template <class _Traits> IDS mfMesh<_Traits>::addVertex(space *coords MF_DMUTEXV)
00227 {
00228         ids idvertex;
00229 
00230         MF_ASSERT(coords);
00231 
00232         MF_LOCK(vertices_mutex);
00233 
00234         idvertex = vertices.getFree();
00235 
00236         MF_UNLOCK(vertices_mutex);
00237 
00238         addVertex(idvertex, coords MF_MUTEXV);
00239 
00240         return idvertex;

00253 template <class _Traits> bool mfMesh<_Traits>::delVertex(ids idvertex MF_DMUTEXV)
00254 {
00255         MF_ASSERT(idvertex >= 0);
00256 
00257         bool temp;
00258 
00259         if(vertices[idvertex].getNumberOfSings(MF_MUTEX) == 0)
00260         {
00261                 MF_LOCK(vertices_mutex);
00262 
00263                 temp = vertices.free(idvertex);
00264 
00265                 MF_UNLOCK(vertices_mutex);
00266         }
00267         else
00268                 temp = false;   
00269 
00270         return temp;
00271 }

00339 template <class _Traits> bool mfMesh<_Traits>::delCell(ids idcell MF_DMUTEXV)
00340 {
00341         MF_ASSERT( (idcell >= 0)&&(idcell <= getCellMaxId(MF_MUTEX)) );
00342 
00343         oper.delCell(idcell MF_MUTEXV);
00344 
00345         MF_LOCK(cells_mutex);
00346 
00347         cells.free(idcell);
00348 
00349         MF_UNLOCK(cells_mutex);
00350 
00351         return true;
00352 }
